name: Nano’s Candy Bar Adventure and Mr.NanoS
name_original: Nano’s Candy Bar Adventure and Mr.NanoS
description: if you went into the mountains, you could go back, for example. Nano was trying to open a candy bar, but he can’t open it, go in the Bank by using a coin or ask match for help! Do not go into the mountains or else another Nano will appear. You could go back and try something else.
